RADIO PROGRAMME COMMITTEE
Meeting of Drama Experts
(Cologne, 11-12 January 1971)
At the request of the Radio Programme Committee and at the
kind invitation of the Westdeutscher Rundfunk, a meeting of Experts in
Radio Drama was held in Cologne on 11 and 12 January 1971.
Those present were
Belgium (BRT)
(rtb)
Canada (CBC)
(SRC)
Denmark (DR)
Finland (YLE)
France (ORTF)
Mr. A. Poppe
Mr. J-L. Jacques
Mr. J. Reeves
Mr. J.G. Pilon
Mile H. Lemche Kraa
Mr. H. Pade
Mr. J. Maentylae
Mr. P. Lounela
Mr. A. Trutat
